ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Unhandled exception while running Heritrix

hi Sriram,

hard to say what might have gone wrong from the job log.
please check the heritrix_out.log for any errors as well.
what version of heritrix are you running, on which platform?
maybe attach your order.xml file for us to look at too.

/steve@...



On 5/19/10 12:16 AM, sriram_varahan1 wrote:
>
>
> Hello,
>
> I have been running Heritrix for some time and recently I got this
> strange exception while launching a job. The details from the job.log
> are as follows:
>
> 2010-05-18T15:43:47.929Z SEVERE Unhandled exception or error intercepted
> 2010-05-18T15:43:47.993Z INFO Job instance discarded
> 2010-05-18T15:43:48.364Z INFO Job instantiated
> 2010-05-18T15:43:48.452Z INFO Job launched
> 2010-05-18T15:43:48.576Z SEVERE RuntimeException:
> com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException: (JE 4.0.71) Environment
> must be closed, caused by: com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException:
> Environment invalid because of previous exception: (JE 4.0.71)
> /root/test_job/state com.sleepycat.je.log.ChecksumException: Read
> invalid log entry type: 99 LOG_CHECKSUM: Checksum invalid on read, log
> is likely invalid. Environment is invalid and must be closed.
> fetchTarget of 0x0/0x40904a parent IN=13 IN
> class=com.sleepycat.je.tree.BIN lastFullVersion=0x2/0xb1fb2
> parent.getDirty()=false state=0 (in thread 'test_job launchthread')
> 2010-05-18T15:43:50.051Z SEVERE Unhandled exception or error intercepted
>
> Can someone please shed some light on the error and what I would need to
> do to avoid this in the future.
>
> Thanks,
> Sriram.
